thread.title: Chaos Ensues As Milwaukee Cops Confront Black Panthers At A Food Giveaway Event!
thread.title_full: Chaos Ensues As Milwaukee Cops Confront Black Panthers At A Food Giveaway Event!

author: NHHMS
title: Chaos Ensues As Milwaukee Cops Confront Black Panthers At A Food Giveaway Event!

organizations.name: chaos ensues as milwaukee cops confront black panthers

text:
Chaos Ensues As Milwaukee Cops Confront Black Panthers At A Food Giveaway Event! By 0 
A Black Panther group says that it was harassed by Milwaukee police officers who also violated their constitutional right to open carry during an event on Wednesday, Dec. 28. The group’s members — associated with the Revolutionary Black Panther Party — said they were legally openly carrying firearms during a food distribution program when police showed up and began to harass them. The group says that police took at least one shotgun, which was later returned. Posted By Persist SHARE
